import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserCard from '../../components/util/UserCard' import { getUsers } from '../../store/actions/userAction' import InfiniteList from '../../components/util/InfiniteList' import Spinner from '../../assets/Spinner.png' import styles from './People.module.css' const People = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {auth, people} = useSelector(state => state) useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getUsers(auth)) }, [auth.user.id]) return (
{people.loading?
: ( {people.users.length > 0 ? people.users.map(user => (
)) :
No user available!
} ) }
) } export default People
